Classes

class HtmlWriter(Ft.Xml.Xslt.XmlWriter.XmlWriter)
Takes events such as those generated by an XSLT processor and invokes a serializer to produce HTML. Uses XML syntax for elements in a non-empty namespace. Instructs the serializer to insert a Content-Type 'meta' element in the first 'head' element.
